'''Grenoble''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] who taught at the [[Academy of Mentalist Study]] in [[Eileanar]] shortly before its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Grenoble was extremely skilled at natural [[divination]] techniques, and taught them at the Academy under Dean [[Zucchi]].
